description: A longtime athlete and staff favorite, the Gecko is Scarpa's most technical approach shoe. The suede upper and lace-to-toe closure system is super adaptable, whether you want to cinch it down for technical terrain or back it off for more casual use, while the SuperGum high-friction rubber outsole was developed to be ultra durable. When the going get’s technical, reach for the Gecko.
name: Scarpa Gecko - Mens
